level.text: The rules in this chapter shall govern the following:
Classification of motor vehicle drivers based on the driver demonstrating that he or she is capable of driving the vehicle in which he or she is tested;
Restricting commercial drivers to one (1) driver’s license;
Commercial drivers licensing and testing standards;
Commercial drivers skills and knowledge tests;
The disqualification of commercial drivers who have committed certain serious traffic violations, or other specified offenses;
Notifying other states regarding commercial drivers records; and
Issuing commercial driver’s licenses and commercial driver’s instruction license.
